channel.title: How do i change the Description for magic spells
channel.description:
How do i change them?
By descriptions i mean
"Shadow Burst" A multi target shadow attack
What file is this in and its not client.java

item.title: How do i change the Description for magic spells
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Donkie Owner Donkie
item.description:
@Owner_Donkie wrote:

Oo, nope sorry i not good with that stuff… I think if the item is nulled it’s because of the client… I know how to add item’s into shops if you need help with that…

Read full topic

Just find the thread it should be on page 1 or 2
